SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.USER_ID, A.EXP_DTM, A.STR_DTM, A.LOGIN_AC_ID, A.LOGIN_AC_PWD, A.LOGIN_AC_PWD_ENC, A.USER_NM, A.USERG_ID, A.DEPT_ID, A.JGD_NM, A.USER_TELNO, A.USER_HTELNO, A.EMAIL_ADDR, A.EXCL_DWLD_AUTH_YN, A.ID_USE_EXP_DT, A.PWD_EXP_DT, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DCD, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, B.USERG_LNM, C.ALL_DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM, CASE WHEN A.DEPT_ID = (SELECT A.DEPT_ID FROM WAA_USER A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE ('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')) THEN 0 ELSE NULL END AS DEPT_SEQ FROM WAA_USER A INNER JOIN WAA_USERG B ON A.USERG_ID = B.USERG_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DEPT C ON A.DEPT_ID = C.DEPT_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE ('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) X
AND USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{userNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND USERG_ID = #{usergId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND UPPER(DEPT_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{deptNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
ORDER BY DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NM, USERG_LNM, USER_NM
